questions: How many days have you had fever or chills?
Highest temperature recorded (°C or °F) and how measured?
Is it constant or intermittent? At what times is it worse?
Any cough, sore throat, rash, burning urination, belly pain, or headache?
Any recent travel, mosquito bites, or sick contacts?
self_care: Fluids/ORS frequently; light clothing; cool room.
Tepid sponging if uncomfortable; avoid ice baths.
red_flags: Severe headache with neck stiffness or new confusion
Shortness of breath or chest pain
Fever > 39.4°C (103°F) or lasting > 3 days without improvement

Chest pain, bluish lips/face, or confusion
High fever or cough > 3 weeks

Any vomiting/diarrhea/constipation or blood in stool?
Any abdominal pain location and character (crampy/sharp)?
Any recent outside food, travel, or antibiotics?
Able to keep fluids down? Urine output okay?
self_care: Light diet (BRAT-style) as tolerated; avoid spicy/fatty foods.
Rest and monitor frequency of stools/urine.
red_flags: Persistent vomiting, signs of dehydration, or dark/bloody stools
Severe abdominal pain with fever or rigid abdomen
Jaundice or uncontrollable diarrhea > 48 hours

questions: How long has the breathing/cough issue been present?
Is the cough dry or with phlegm? Any blood?
Any fever, chest pain, or wheezing?
Do you have asthma/COPD or smoke/vape?
Any recent travel or sick contacts?
self_care: Warm fluids for throat comfort; rest as needed.
Monitor breathing; note triggers and sputum color.
red_flags: Severe difficulty breathing or oxygen saturation < 94% if available
Chest pain, bluish lips/face, or confusion
High fever or cough > 3 weeks

questions: How long have the stomach/bowel symptoms been present?
Any vomiting/diarrhea/constipation or blood in stool?
Any abdominal pain location and character (crampy/sharp)?
Any recent outside food, travel, or antibiotics?
Able to keep fluids down? Urine output okay?
self_care: Light diet (BRAT-style) as tolerated; avoid spicy/fatty foods.
Rest and monitor frequency of stools/urine.
red_flags: Persistent vomiting, signs of dehydration, or dark/bloody stools
Severe abdominal pain with fever or rigid abdomen
Jaundice or uncontrollable diarrhea > 48 hours
